short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to help quickly calculate different probability values for various distributions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate different probability values, expected value, and variance for the following distributions: Binomial, Geometric, Hypergeometric, Poisson, Negative Binomial, Uniform, Normal, Exponential, Chi-square, and Gamma. Moreover, this tool offers quick z-table lookups for arbitrary ranges.
